issue.title: parquet-arrow example has compilation errors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3898](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3898). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When compiling example, reader-writer.cc, it shows following compilation errors:

 **no member named 'cout' in namespace 'std'**

  PARQUET_THROW_NOT_OK(arrow::PrettyPrint(\*array, 4, &std::cout));

in multiple places.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3898?focusedCommentId=16706086) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3049
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3049>
